title: New: Bruno Major – Easily
content:
Bruno Major just gets love songs.

Sure, there’s occasionally a slightly sugary sweet tinge to his songwriting, however they manage to come across as effortlessly slick and reassuringly heartfelt. His latest, Easily, finds him in full on crooner dive-bar mode, yet knowingly so; proving glowingly affecting. Check it out below.
